content: Hi all, hope you don't mind a little cross-promotion. We've created a community special interest group focussed on distributed transactions. Its part of the TiKV community (TiKV is an open-source distributed and transactional key-value store written entirely in Rust), but I hope the SIG can be more of a space for talking about distributed transactions in general, not limited to just TiKV.
If you're interested, there are more details in the announcement blog post: https://tikv.org/blog/announcing-sig-txn/
